altername_name: Paleto Jones y la Flauta de Bartolo
name: Paleto Jones and Bartolo's flute
overview: Young Jones sets off in search of Bartolo's flute, the one with only one hole. Her latest investigations of him place her hidden deep within the Blue Grotto. Legend has it that the power of said flute is superhuman and makes you dominate the art of music like nobody else...
